page.title: 14Education-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: In this area there is only one{primary {school.}The school is called Bolton by Bowland C.E ,there are 29 pupils from 4 to 11 years.In the Infants are the under eights with one teacher and the over eights are in the other classroom.The cook makes dinners for Gisburn School helped by another lady.There is also a caretaker,a clerk and an ancillary helper who helps with art work and goes to help at the swimming baths. Some children come more than 3 miles to school.In the winter the school is sometimes closed because of snowdrifts or because the power lines have come down.When the pupils are eleven they have to sit an examination which helps to decide whether they go to the {secondary school}at Grindleton or the grammar school in Clitheroe.
